owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

DEFAULT_GAS_LIMIT().notice: Default gas limit for simple transfers

PRIORITY_GAS_MULTIPLIER().notice: Gas price multiplier for priority transactions

bridgeETH(address).notice: Bridge ETH to Arbitrum with automatic optimization

chainInboxes(uint256).notice: Mapping of supported chain IDs to their Inbox addresses

getOptimizedParams(address,uint256,uint2.notice: Get optimized bridge parameters for a transaction

getTransactionStatus(bytes32).notice: Check if a transaction exists and its status

setInboxForChain(uint256,address).notice: Set inbox address for a specific chain

userGasStats(address).notice: Mapping to track gas usage statistics
